xwikidoc.name: Sponsors
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.ABader
xwikidoc.content:
1 Sponsors #titlebar("Help Curriki Grow" "" "" "green") If you are interested in joining our team of partners or sponsors, please send an email to {mailto:Sponsors@curriki.org}.
You may also help our cause by making a tax-deductible gift of cash, stock, or other securities to Curriki. Checks made payable to Curriki – Global Education & Learning Community may be sent to:
Curriki
450 Massachusetts Avenue, NW
Suite 522
Washington, DC, 20001 For all other types of gifts, or if you have questions or need additional information, please contact Bobbi Kurshan at her Curriki email address or call the Curriki office at (202) 898-0833. Return to the [Partners Page>Main.Partners] to learn about some of our current supporters.
